name: The Flute
description: Beneath its rusty exterior is a lavishly decorated thin blade. It swings as swiftly as the wind.
effect: Normal or Charged Attacks grant a Harmonic on hits. Gaining 5 Harmonics triggers the power of music and deals {0} ATK DMG to surrounding opponents. Harmonics last up to 30s, and a maximum of 1 can be gained every 0.5s.
